WizardTD

类 GameInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • WizardTD.GameInterface

  • public class GameInterface
extends java.lang.Object
    GameInterface class handles the interactions between different components of the game. It is a collection of draw methods, as well as handling object interactions.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      GameInterface(processing.core.PApplet app, boolean endless, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Button> menuButtons, char[][] mapLayout, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,processing.core.PImage> mapElement, java.util.List<Wave> wavesList, int lastWaveNumber, int totalWaveNumberStreak, Mana mana, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Button> buttonElement, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,processing.core.PImage> towerElement, int initialTowerRange, double initialTowerFiringSpeed, int initialTowerDamage, int towerCost, processing.core.PImage bulletImage)

    • 方法详细资料

      • checkMousePosition

        public boolean checkMousePosition(int x,
                                  int y,
                                  int width,
                                  int height)
        Check whether rmouse position is in a specific area or not
        参数:
        x - The x-position of the target area.
        y - The y-position of the target area.
        width - The width of the target area.
        height - The height of the target area.
        返回:
        A boolean that whether the mouse is in the area.

      • isGameWin

        public boolean isGameWin()
        Check whether the game is won. The game will win if: 1. it is the last wave 2. the wave is finish 3. no remaining monsters in the gameboard 4. no monster to be spawned in the current wave
        返回:
        A boolean that the game is won or not.

      • isGameLost

        public boolean isGameLost()
        Check whether the game is lost.
        返回:
        A boolean that the game is lost or not.

      • isReadyForNextRound

        public boolean isReadyForNextRound()
        Check whether the game is ready for the next round in the endless mode.
        返回:
        A boolean that indicate the next round status.

      • updateReadyForNextRound

        public void updateReadyForNextRound()
        Updates the next round status.

      • getWavesList

        public java.util.List<Wave> getWavesList()
        Get the current wave list for the endless mode to upgrade the wave.
        返回:
        Current wave list.

      • updateEndlessInformation

        public void updateEndlessInformation(java.util.List<Wave> updatedWavesList)
        Updates the game in the endless mode by making the next wave harder.
        参数:
        updatedWavesList - the next five waves
